narrative: I was parked outside my house in Jaipur. Car hit from behind at 9pm. FIR filed and photos attached.
Car was hit, kuch pata nahi, will file later.
Two-wheeler bumped my bumper on Delhi-Gurgaon highway. Took photos, no FIR yet.
Collision at traffic signal. Driver fled. Reported to police, FIR00045.
Minor scratch at parking lot, no injuries, no police report.
